title: davecoin
author: davecoin
created_time: February 16, 2023, 11:54:02 PMLast edit: February 18, 2023, 05:20:26 PM by davecoin
content: I'm looking to sell the following Titan physical bitcoins:(COIN 1) 1 BTC 1 oz silver(COIN 2) 1 BTC goldine (COIN 3) 0.5 BTC goldine(COIN 4) 0.1 BTC 1 oz silverAll of them come with certificates of authenticity.  Unfortunately they were redeemed due to the issues surrounding Titan's 2FA coins. Coins 1-3 come with clamshell cases, coin (4) comes in a nice pouch. All are redeemed and therefore have no bitcoin balance.  Do not fund after purchasing. Buyer assumes private key is compromised.Would prefer to sell as a lot.Payment in btc/ltc/xmr. Open to trades.Thanks!Asking .03 BTCPending Sale.

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: can you share photos? I dont know the coins by name but I may be interested if any are ones I do not have.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Pictures would sure help in me to gauge interest in purchasing any of these.  Upload here and post along with user name and date to confirm you have these https://imgur.com/upload  Thanks and good luck with your sales!
